name: Beat the Odds
description:
*Make sure audio is on!*

You really should be careful when accepting those terms and conditions. You never know when an evil computer might steal your soul.

Play some luck-based challenges in order to win your soul back! But be careful... I don't think the computer is going to play fair. You might have to figure out how to rig the games in your favor...

Test your luck, play for keeps, and Beat The Odds!
